translations.about.title: About TempMail4U
translations.about.subtitle: TempMail4U is your trusted provider of free, private, and disposable email addresses. We created this service with one goal: to help people stay safe, spam-free, and anonymous online.
translations.about.story.title: Our Story
translations.about.story.para1: TempMail4U was born out of frustration with endless spam, hacked email lists, and complicated sign-ups. We wanted a **simple, instant, and secure** solution that anyone could use without giving away personal details.
translations.about.story.para2: Today, thousands of users worldwide rely on TempMail4U daily to keep their inbox clean while signing up for websites, testing apps, and downloading resources.
translations.about.mission.title: Our Mission
translations.about.mission.para: Our mission is to **protect your privacy and save your time online**. We believe every user should have the freedom to sign up, explore, and test services without worrying about spam, leaks, or unwanted emails.
translations.about.difference.title: What Makes TempMail4U Different?
translations.about.difference.li1: {$START_TAG_STRONG}No signup required:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} Just open the site and start using your disposable inbox instantly.
translations.about.difference.li2: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Multiple options:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} Choose between 10-minute mail, 20-minute, 30-minute, or 7-day saved inboxes.
translations.about.difference.li3: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Privacy first:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} We don’t track you, log your usage, or sell your data.
translations.about.difference.li4: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Clean & fast:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} No ads, no captchas, no clutter — just a simple, reliable experience.
translations.about.join.title: Join Our Growing Community
translations.about.join.para: Over {$START_TAG_STRONG}500,000+ people{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} have already used TempMail4U to keep their email safe. Whether you’re a student, developer, freelancer, or just someone who values privacy — this service is built for you.

translations.email10minTitle: 10 Minutes Temporary Email – Free Disposable Inbox Without Signup
translations.email10minSubtitle: Instantly generate a {$START_TAG_STRONG}10 minutes temporary email address{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}. Perfect for email verifications, OTPs, and anonymous sign-ups without exposing your personal inbox.
translations.whatIs10minEmail: What is a 10 Minutes Temporary Email?
translations.10minEmailDesc1: A {$START_TAG_STRONG}10 minutes temporary email{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} is a disposable, anonymous inbox that lasts only 10 minutes. It's ideal for one-time registrations, email confirmations, downloading files, and avoiding spam.
translations.10minEmailDesc2: No sign-up or personal data is required, making it the safest way to stay anonymous online. Use it as a throwaway email whenever you need a quick, secure inbox.
translations.feature3: Receive OTPs, confirmations, and attachments securely
translations.featureDesc1: All messages are automatically deleted after 10 minutes to protect your privacy.
translations.featureDesc2: Simply visit the page to start — no login, no password, no hassle.
translations.featureDesc3: We don't store or log any user data; all inboxes are wiped clean after use.
translations.howToUseTitle: How to Use a 10 Minutes Temporary Email
translations.step1: {$START_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$CLOSE_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$START_TAG_SPAN}Visit our site to instantly receive a free temporary inbox.{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}
translations.step2: {$START_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$CLOSE_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$START_TAG_SPAN}Copy your 10 minutes temporary email address and use it for registrations or verifications.{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}
translations.step3: {$START_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$CLOSE_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$START_TAG_SPAN}Receive OTPs or confirmation emails instantly — inbox refreshes every 10 seconds.{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}
translations.step4: {$START_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$CLOSE_TAG_LUCIDE_ICON}{$START_TAG_SPAN}All data is permanently deleted after 10 minutes for maximum privacy.{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}
translations.useCasesTitle: When to Use a Disposable Email Address
translations.faq1Answer: A temporary email address that expires after 10 minutes, perfect for receiving one-time messages or verification links. Need more time? Try our free {$START_LINK}20-minute temporary email{$CLOSE_LINK} or {$START_LINK_1}30-minute temporary email{$CLOSE_LINK} instead.
translations.faq2Answer: Yes, it's completely free. No sign-up needed, no ads, and no premium charges.
translations.faq3Question: Can I receive OTPs and confirmation emails?
translations.faq3Answer: Yes, the temporary inbox supports all common email types including OTPs and confirmation links.
translations.faq4Question: Can I extend the timer for my temporary email?
translations.faq4Answer: Yes, simply click the "Reset" button to restart the 10-minute countdown.
translations.faq5Question: Is this email address truly anonymous?
translations.faq5Answer: Absolutely. We do not collect or track any personal data; every inbox is temporary and private.
translations.faq6Question: How many temporary emails can I create?
translations.faq6Answer: Unlimited. Create as many temporary inboxes as you want, each with its own time limit.
translations.faq7Answer: Yes, the service is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices.
translations.faq8Question: Is it safe for important messages?
translations.faq8Answer: It's suitable for short-term use like OTPs and confirmation emails. Avoid using it for sensitive personal information.
translations.faq9Question: Is it better than using a fake email?
translations.faq9Answer: Yes! Unlike fake emails, this service provides a real, functioning inbox for legitimate message receipt.

translations.home.section.hero.title.label: Free Temporary Email Service
translations.home.section.hero.subtitle.label: Instantly create a {$START_TAG_STRONG}temporary email{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} with {$START_TAG_STRONG}TempMail4U{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}. Get a {$START_EMPHASISED_TEXT}disposable email address{$CLOSE_EMPHASISED_TEXT} that protects your privacy, no signup, no spam, no risk. Use it for quick website registrations, app testing, downloads, or anytime you need a secure {$START_EMPHASISED_TEXT}burner email{$CLOSE_EMPHASISED_TEXT} to keep your real inbox clean.
translations.home.section.what.title.label: What is a Temporary Email?
translations.home.section.what.para1.label: A {$START_TAG_STRONG}temporary email{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} (also called {$START_EMPHASISED_TEXT}disposable email, fake email, burner mail, or temp mail{$CLOSE_EMPHASISED_TEXT}) is a short-lived inbox that you can use for online activities. Instead of giving out your personal Gmail, Outlook, or Yahoo address, you get an instant anonymous inbox that automatically deletes itself after a certain time.
translations.home.section.what.para2.label: It’s perfect for {$START_TAG_STRONG}website sign-ups, downloading files, receiving verification codes, or testing new apps{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}. Once you’re done, the address vanishes, leaving your personal email safe and spam-free.
translations.home.section.why.title.label: Why Do You Need Temp Mail?
translations.home.section.why.intro.label: Sharing your real email everywhere is risky. Companies often sell addresses to marketers, hackers target leaked databases, and spam clogs your inbox. {$START_TAG_STRONG}Using a disposable email gives you control.{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}
translations.home.section.why.li1.label: Protect your personal inbox from endless spam and ads
translations.home.section.why.li2.label: Stay {$START_TAG_STRONG}anonymous{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} when signing up on new platforms
translations.home.section.why.li3.label: Prevent your private email from being leaked, hacked, or resold
translations.home.section.why.li4.label: Keep your real email clean and professional for important use only
translations.home.section.why.li5.label: Safely test new apps, services, and free trials without long-term commitment
translations.home.section.how.title.label: How It Works – Simple and Fast
translations.home.section.how.step1.title.label: 1. Generate an Email
translations.home.section.how.step1.desc.label: The moment you visit, you automatically get a working temporary email address. No signup, no captcha, no waiting.
translations.home.section.how.step2.title.label: 2. Use It Anywhere
translations.home.section.how.step2.desc.label: Copy your burner email and paste it into forms, websites, apps, or downloads. Messages land instantly in your inbox here.
translations.home.section.how.step3.title.label: 3. Save or Let It Expire
translations.home.section.how.step3.desc.label: By default, emails last 24 hours. But if needed, you can bookmark your inbox link and keep it active for up to 7 days.
translations.home.section.when.title.label: When Should You Use Temp Mail?
translations.home.section.when.intro.label: A temporary email isn’t for everything, it’s best used for quick, low-risk, and disposable tasks. Here are the most popular uses:
translations.home.section.when.card1.label: One-time website registrations
translations.home.section.when.card2.label: Testing apps, betas, or SaaS tools
translations.home.section.when.card3.label: Online shopping discounts & coupons
translations.home.section.when.card4.label: Downloading free ebooks or resources
translations.home.section.when.card5.label: Avoiding unwanted newsletters
translations.home.section.when.card6.label: Staying anonymous on forums or blogs

translations.home.section.who.intro.label: Temporary emails are not just for techies. {$START_TAG_STRONG}Anyone who values privacy, security, or a clutter-free inbox can benefit:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}

translations.home.section.security.title.label: Your Privacy and Security Come First
translations.home.section.security.para.label: Unlike shady services, we don’t track you, log your data, or sell your information. Every inbox is {$START_TAG_STRONG}private, anonymous, and auto-deleted{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} after its lifetime ends. This ensures complete safety and peace of mind whenever you use Temp Mail.
translations.home.section.variants.title.label: Types of Temp Mail We Offer
translations.home.section.variants.intro.label: Different tasks need different lifespans. That’s why we provide multiple options:
translations.home.section.variants.li1.label: {$START_TAG_STRONG}10-Minute Mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} – perfect for quick one-time codes
translations.home.section.variants.li2.label: {$START_TAG_STRONG}20-Minute Mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} – a little more time for registrations
translations.home.section.variants.li3.label: {$START_TAG_STRONG}30-Minute Mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} – when you need extended temporary access
translations.home.section.variants.li4.label: {$START_TAG_STRONG}7-Day Saved Inbox{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} – ideal for projects, trials, and follow-ups
translations.home.section.faq.title.label: Frequently Asked Questions about Temporary Email
translations.home.section.faq.q1.label: What is a temporary email?
translations.home.section.faq.a1.label: A temporary email (also called a one-time inbox, disposable mailbox, or burner address) is a short-lived account you can use to sign up on websites, receive verification codes, or keep your real inbox safe from spam.
translations.home.section.faq.q2.label: How do I create a disposable email?
translations.home.section.faq.a2.label: You don’t need to register. Simply open this page and your anonymous inbox is generated instantly. You can refresh for a new one or choose a custom username before the {$INTERPOLATION} symbol.
translations.home.section.faq.q3.label: How long does a temporary inbox last?
translations.home.section.faq.a3.label: By default, emails stay for 24 hours in your browser. If you click save, your inbox can remain active for 7 days. We also offer {$START_TAG_STRONG}10 minute mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}, {$START_TAG_STRONG}20 minute mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}, and {$START_TAG_STRONG}30 minute mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} options.
translations.home.section.faq.q4.label: Is a disposable inbox safe to use?
translations.home.section.faq.a4.label: Yes. All data is stored locally in your browser session. We don’t log or track your usage. This makes temporary addresses secure, private, and spam-free.
translations.home.section.faq.q5.label: What can I use a fake email for?
translations.home.section.faq.a5.label: These short-term addresses are best for signing up on new websites, app testing, online shopping, downloading files, or anywhere you don’t want to share your personal email. They help keep your main inbox clean.
translations.home.section.faq.q6.label: Can I send emails from this address?
translations.home.section.faq.a6.label: No. These inboxes are receive-only. They are designed for registrations, verifications, and quick one-time use, not for sending or long-term communication.
translations.home.section.faq.q7.label: What’s the difference between temp mail and regular email?
translations.home.section.faq.a7.label: Regular emails (like Gmail, Yahoo, Outlook) require personal info, stay permanent, and often get spam. Temporary inboxes are anonymous, require no signup, and automatically expire.
translations.home.section.faq.q8.label: Can I extend the life of my inbox?
translations.home.section.faq.a8.label: Yes. By saving the session or copying your unique access link, you can return anytime within 7 days. After that, the inbox is deleted permanently.
translations.home.section.faq.q9.label: Is there a 10 minute mail option?
translations.home.section.faq.a9.label: Yes. We provide {$START_TAG_STRONG}10 minute temp mail{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} as well as 20 minute and 30 minute variants for quick and disposable use. These are perfect for short sign-ups or one-time verification codes.
translations.home.section.faq.q10.label: Why should I use a private inbox instead of my real one?
translations.home.section.faq.a10.label: Using a temporary address protects your privacy, avoids spam, keeps your main inbox clean, and reduces the risk of your personal data being leaked or sold.
translations.home.section.cta.title.label: Experience Truly Private Communication
translations.home.section.cta.subtitle.label: Join over {$START_TAG_STRONG}500,000+ users{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} worldwide who use our {$START_EMPHASISED_TEXT}burner email generator{$CLOSE_EMPHASISED_TEXT} daily to stay safe online. No tracking, no logs, no credit card required, just pure privacy when you need it.
translations.home.section.cta.button.label: Generate Email Now
translations.home.section.cta.disclaimer.label: 100% Free Forever • Secure • Spam-Free

translations.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
translations.privacy.introduction.title: 1. Introduction
translations.privacy.introduction.content: Welcome to Temporary Email Service ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our temporary email service.
translations.privacy.infoCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
translations.privacy.infoCollect.tempEmails.title: 2.1 Temporary Email Addresses
translations.privacy.infoCollect.tempEmails.content: We generate temporary email addresses for your use. These addresses are created randomly and are not linked to your personal identity. We do not collect or store any personal information that could identify you.
translations.privacy.infoCollect.emailContent.title: 2.2 Email Content
translations.privacy.infoCollect.emailContent.content: When emails are sent to your temporary email address, we temporarily store the email content to display it to you. This content is automatically deleted after a specified period (typically 7 days for saved emails, 24 Hours for unsaved emails).
translations.privacy.infoCollect.usageData.title: 2.3 Usage Data
translations.privacy.infoCollect.usageData.intro: We may collect anonymous usage statistics such as:
translations.privacy.infoCollect.usageData.purpose: This data is used solely to improve our service and is not linked to your identity.
translations.privacy.howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
translations.privacy.howWeUse.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
translations.privacy.howWeUse.item1: To provide and maintain our temporary email service
translations.privacy.howWeUse.item2: To display emails sent to your temporary address
translations.privacy.howWeUse.item3: To generate access links for saved emails
translations.privacy.howWeUse.item4: To improve our service and user experience
translations.privacy.howWeUse.item5: To prevent abuse and ensure service security
translations.privacy.infoSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
translations.privacy.infoSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances:
translations.privacy.infoSharing.legal: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Legal Requirements:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} If required by law or to protect our rights and safety
translations.privacy.infoSharing.providers: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Service Providers:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} With trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our service (e.g., hosting providers)
translations.privacy.infoSharing.business: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Business Transfers:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.intro: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.https: All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.storage: Email content is stored securely and automatically deleted
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.access: Access to our systems is restricted and monitored
translations.privacy.dataSecurity.audits: Regular security audits and updates are performed
translations.privacy.dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
translations.privacy.dataRetention.content: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Temporary Emails:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} Unsaved emails are automatically deleted after 24 Hours.{$LINE_BREAK}{$START_TAG_STRONG}Saved Emails:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} Saved emails are retained for 7 days and then automatically deleted.{$LINE_BREAK}{$START_TAG_STRONG}Usage Data:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} Anonymous usage statistics may be retained for up to 1 year for service improvement purposes.
translations.privacy.yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
translations.privacy.yourRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your information:
translations.privacy.yourRights.access: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Access:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} You can view emails sent to your temporary address
translations.privacy.yourRights.deletion: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Deletion:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} You can delete saved emails at any time
translations.privacy.yourRights.portability: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Portability:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} You can export your saved emails
translations.privacy.yourRights.objection: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Objection:{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} You can object to certain processing activities
translations.privacy.cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
translations.privacy.cookies.content: We use minimal cookies necessary for the functioning of our service. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party analytics that could identify individual users.
translations.privacy.thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
translations.privacy.thirdParty.content: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before using their services.
translations.privacy.children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
translations.privacy.children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
translations.privacy.international.title: 11. International Data Transfers
translations.privacy.international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards.
translations.privacy.changes.title: 12. Changes to This Privacy Policy
translations.privacy.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
translations.privacy.contact.title: 13. Contact Us
translations.privacy.contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
translations.privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

translations.terms.title: Terms & Conditions
translations.terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using TempMail4U’s services.
translations.terms.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
translations.terms.acceptance.para: By accessing or using TempMail4U (the “Service”), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, you must discontinue using our one time email, temporary email, temp mail, and temporary inbox services.
translations.terms.use.title: 2. Permitted Use
translations.terms.use.para: TempMail4U provides disposable inboxes for short-term use. You may use them for sign-ups, testing, downloads, and other lawful activities. You may not use the Service to send spam, abuse, phishing attempts, or any unlawful content.
translations.terms.limits.title: 3. Limitations
translations.terms.limits.li1: All inboxes are temporary and may expire automatically.
translations.terms.limits.li2: The Service is receive-only; you cannot send outgoing emails.
translations.terms.limits.li3: We do not guarantee email delivery or retention.
translations.terms.limits.li4: We are not responsible for loss of data once an inbox expires.
translations.terms.privacy.title: 4. Privacy
translations.terms.privacy.para: TempMail4U does not collect personal information when you generate a one time email or temporary inbox. For more details, please review our {$START_LINK}Privacy Policy{$CLOSE_LINK}.
translations.terms.disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer of Liability
translations.terms.disclaimer.para: The Service is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. TempMail4U shall not be held liable for damages, losses, or consequences resulting from the use or misuse of the Service.
translations.terms.changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
translations.terms.changes.para: We may update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of the Service after changes implies acceptance.
translations.terms.contact.title: 7. Contact Us
translations.terms.contact.para: If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please reach us via our {$START_LINK}Contact Us{$CLOSE_LINK} page.
translations.seo.terms.title: Terms & Conditions – TempMail4U | Temporary Email & Temp Mail
